column4: Hi guys does anyone know if there are any bugs in ubuntu 10.04 x32 for some reason my icons on the top left never stay and i am always having to readd them also everytime i min. firefox it goes away but stays open if anyone has any ideas ?
That is possibly a Panel problem. Reset the panels to fix that up, :)
I think, Firefox is not being closed properly. You can kill the process to end it,
